final_poem:
Fragile threads of forgotten time
Unravel in the whispers of the mind
Echoes of laughter, tears, and sighs
Whispers that refuse to demise

In dusty corners of the heart
Memories slumber, never apart
From moments long since lost to sight
Where shadows still hold on to light

Like autumn leaves, they fall away
As seasons pass with fleeting day
And though the mind tries to recall
The memories remain standing tall
